MessageAsset.messageText:
Hey Skarn,

Just wanted to let you know I’m sorry about how things ended. Never meant for it all to get so out of hand, and I do feel really bad. I put in a transfer request to the Frostbaned depths, so you probably won’t see me again for a while. My post starts next week. You don’t have to reply to this, but if you ever want to get back in touch, pass a note to Gneiss.

-Blair.
